title: Player Unknown's Battlegrounds: PUBG
description: PUBG Mobile is a battle-royale shooter where up to 100 players parachute onto an island to scavenge, survive, and fight to be the last squad standing.

title: Call of Duty: Mobile
description: Call of Duty: Mobile delivers console-like multiplayer and battle royale modes on mobile.

title: Clash of Clans
description: Build your village, train troops, and join clans to wage large-scale wars.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Genshin Impact is an open-world action RPG with elemental combat, rich storyline, and anime-style visuals.

title: Among Us
description: A social deduction game where crewmates complete tasks while impostors sabotage them.

title: Free Fire
description: Fast-paced battle royale optimized for mobile with short match times.

title: Minecraft
description: Create, explore, and survive in a block-based sandbox world with multiplayer options.

title: Valorant
description: Tactical 5v5 shooter combining precise gunplay with unique agent abilities.

title: Fortnite
description: Blends building mechanics with battle royale shooting in a vibrant world.

title: Asphalt 9: Legends
description: High-octane arcade racing with cinematic graphics and exotic cars.

title: Candy Crush Saga
description: Match-3 puzzle gameplay with colorful levels, boosters, and social features.

title: League of Legends: Wild Rift
description: Brings LoLâ€™s 5v5 MOBA gameplay to mobile with faster matches and champion diversity.

title: Subway Surfers
description: Endless runner where players dash through cityscapes, dodge obstacles, and collect coins.

title: Apex Legends Mobile
description: Squad-based battle royale featuring unique legends with abilities and fast movement.

title: Temple Run 2
description: An endless runner set in ancient temples where players jump, slide, and evade obstacles.
